alert.note: Alert for Geauga; Portage; Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 3:27AM EDT until April 01 at 3:45AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM EDT FOR EASTERN PORTAGE...SOUTHEASTERN GEAUGA AND STARK COUNTIES... At 326 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Ashtabula to Garrettsville to near North Canton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Canton, Ravenna, Alliance, North Canton, Louisville, Minerva, Hartville, Garrettsville, Navarre, Waynesburg, East Sparta, Randolph, Parkman, Atwater, Edinburg, Windham, East Canton, Deerfield, Meyers Lake and Hills And Dales. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
